scene.linetrail



class LineTrail: scene.lineemitter.LineEmitter;
Line trail particle system (trail following moving objects). Needs an owner to work.

protected void draw(VideoDriver driver);
Draw the particle system.

class LineTrailFactory: scene.lineemitter.LineEmitterFactoryBase!(LineTrail).LineEmitterFactoryBase;
Factory used to produce line trails.
